strapiPost.title: Only In Arkansas Highlights 8th St Market Restaurant
strapiPost.content:
Only in Arkansas highlighted a family-owned and operated Asian Fusion restaurant that recently changed its name, but has remained a Bentonville favorite. 

  • New name: Dough Zone in the 8th Street Market rebranded last year and became Roll & Fold. The new name came from the way most of the food on the menu is prepared â€” by rolling noodle dough and folding dumplings. 
  • On the menu: Everything at Roll & Fold is made on-site and full of homemade ingredients. The menu is a fusion of Asian street food dishes concentrating on Japanese, Korean, Malaysian, and Chinese. We recommend trying the egg rolls and any noodle dish.

Read the full Only in Arkansas article HERE.
